mainContent.description: To streamline international trade and expand global connectivity, we have established a network of Country-Specific Trade Desks for Gujranwala’s business community. Operating in collaboration with partner organisations across South Asia, ASEAN, Central Asia, Africa, the Middle East, and Europe, these dedicated desks act as strategic gateways for information exchange, B2B matchmaking, and trade coordination. Through these platforms, local industries gain direct access to market insights, export opportunities, and region-specific business support. The Trade Desks help bridge communication gaps, simplify cross-border transactions, and promote lasting business partnerships. By providing businesses with focused, country-level engagement channels, GBA continues to expand Gujranwala’s global reach and foster sustainable international trade growth.
